document_data.name: ''Cloak of Shadows''
document_data.creator: [[Mask]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''cloak of shadows''''' was a unique [[magic item]] worn by the [[avatar]] of [[Mask]], Master of All Thieves.
document_data.Powers: Wearing the ''cloak of shadows'' allowed Mask to become invisible and fly at will. The power of the ''cloak'' could also completely disguise Mask as anyone he imagined.
document_data.History: Mask was known to occasionally loan the ''cloak of shadows'' to his faithful to aid them in completing missions in his name.
